description: Director Pamela Adlon has done the nearly impossible: crafted a film that mines comic gold from people being loving to one another while acting responsibly.
title: ‘Babes’ Review: A Gross-Out Comedy That’s Hilarious, Inspiring, And Groundbreaking

description: Observer was on-set with judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith and hosts Zach Cherry and Casey Wilson as 'The Great American Baking Show' shot its second season for Roku in the familiar tent outside of London.
title: Inside ‘The Great American Baking Show’: Apple Pie, Handshakes, and No Oat Milk

description: Her eponymous gallery staged Jean Michel-Basquiat's debut solo show in the U.S.
title: Art Dealer Annina Nosei Donates Her Gallery Catalogues to Magazzino Italian Art

description: The Svalbard seed vault holds more than 1.25 million seed samples representing thousands of plant species.
title: The Scientists Behind the Arctic ‘Doomsday Vault’ Receive the World Food Prize

description: The combination of increasing tariffs, softening EV sales, and a lack of awareness of Chinese EVs mean it is unlikely that Zeekr's blockbuster IPO will lead to increased consumer interest in the U.S.
title: Will Zeekr’s IPO Bounce Get Americans Excited About Chinese EVs?

description: “The fact that Christie’s was able to respond effectively so quickly to its security breach indicates that people there have thought about and planned for these situations."
title: What Buyers and Sellers Need to Know About Art Auction Security in the Age of Cyberattacks

description: Whether you’re looking to relax fireside under the stars at a luxury mountain resort or experience some of the best hiking in the Rockies, here’s where to explore in Colorado this summer.
title: Colorado’s Most Charming Towns for a Summer Escape

description: A fascinating exhibition of hairwork and eye miniatures examines the 18th- and 19th-century vogue of giving ones lover a piece of oneself.
title: One Fine Show: ‘Eternal Love and Loss’ at the Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art

description: "I want each viewer to experience it in their own way, from their own perspective."
title: Artist Virginia Overton Takes Us Inside the Domino Sugar Sign Transformation

description: “Restaurants are a sanctuary and a place that can remind us all that we are all human," SevenRooms CEO Joel Montaniel tellsl Observer.
title: How Joel Montaniel Helps Restaurants Find and Keep Their Best Customers
